text:
This is the best kindergarten you can send your child to. All my four children attend this kindergarten.

It is not expensive. They have a holistic program that expose your child to various subjects.

They teach your children life skills at meth and also Chinese hand opinion. The Chinese teacher speaks to your child only in mandarin, which helps stem learn the language.

The children love going to school and it gives them such a good impression of school, starting them on the right track to  learning.

If you are interested in sending your child here, you need to queue up early to register because it is extremely popular.

Furthermore, the uniform looks great  üòÉ

I am so grateful for what CWK has done for my kids. They acquired discipline, maintained healthy habits and happiness, while excelled academically. The teachers are loving and supportive. I can't ask for more.

Heartfelt thanks to CWK the incredible staff, and her wonderful teachers for creating such a warm, nurturing environment where she could grow, learn, and thrive. Your dedication, hard work, and patience have been nothing short of inspiring. Each day, she came home with new stories, smiles, and excitement for learning, all thanks to the love and commitment you bring to your work. We are truly grateful for the positive impact you‚Äôve had on her early years, and we couldn‚Äôt have asked for a better start to her journey. The pastoral aspect is very good. During HBL, the effort to create engaging in-house videos and worksheets/ workbooks helped children to continue learning.
Great neighborhood kindergarten, my son spent ~2 years here and he loved it
